summary:
This mod changes loading screens a static image, which I think is consistent with the lore, eliminates rotating objects, deletes spoilers, removes smoke and replaces it with a harsh picture of Nordic metal.

Tamriel not need spoilers or drunken objects.


Este mod cambia las pantallas carga por una imagen estatica, qu
descriptionHtml:
[b]This mod changes loading screens a static image, which I think is consistent with the lore, eliminates rotating objects, deletes spoilers, removes smoke and replaces it with a harsh picture of Nordic metal. [/b]

This is my first mod, and I wanted to find this mod and did not appear in nexus I've done for myself, is in alpha version.

(just checked in 1920x1080 resolution)
Personally I think the original loading screens are terrible and may be a nostalgic Morrowind or Oblivion but really missed that kind of loading screen.
[u]No more smoke, no more  objects drunk and [u]no more [/u]spoilers.[/u]
My idea is to advance the mod, the artworks of Skyrim'll add when I have time.

[b]Installation. [/b]
Download the file and copy the Interface folder that is inside the Data folder, if you do not have that folder, create it. 

[b]Requirements.[/b] 
Just give thanks and comment on the mod xD 
Hope you like it;)


Este es mi primer mod, he buscado durante mucho tiempo un mod como este en nexus y nunca lo he encontrado asique he decidido hacerlo yo.

(Solo comprobado en resolucion de 1920x1080)
Personalmente creo que las pantallas de carga originales son horribles y puede que sea un nostalgico de Morrowind o Oblivion pero echaba mucho de menos ese estilo de pantalla de carga. [u]No mas humo, no mas objetos borrachos y no mas spoilers.[/u]  Mi idea es hacer progresar el mod, añadire los artworks de Skyrim cuando tenga tiempo.

[b]Instalación.[/b]
Descarga el archivo y copialo en la carpeta Interface que esta dentro de la carpeta Data, si no tienes esa carpeta, creala.

[b]Requisitos.[/b]
Solo dar las gracias y opinar sobre el mod xD
Espero que os guste ;)
author: 3Clayman
